idea-plugin.name: Base16 Gigavolt
idea-plugin.vendor: Aidan Swope (http://github.com/Whillikers), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Gigavolt for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Aidan Swope (http://github.com/Whillikers). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
